item.title: Marketing Technology is Changing the World. And Marketers Are Getting Left Behind.
item.description:
Marketing Technology is Changing the World. And Marketers Are Getting Left Behind.

By Katherine Ogburn, Director of Strategy, Ready State In an early episode of Mad Men, Don Draper spars with a researcher about the value of the customer insights she'd collected. Don argued that creatives need to show the future, not the past, and that data couldn't show a brand where to go.
